content: if you are looking for a crochet project that is quick easy and also functional the juniper wall hanging pattern may be a perfect fit these pretty wall hangings make great last-minute gifts and are a unique addition for market prep **approx measurements** approx size 15 w x 16 l fringe not included size depends on the yarn used **supplies needed** approximate yardage is 440 yds of 4 weight yarn you will also need 7 beads 1 18 - 20 dowel or branch **skill level** easy you must be familiar with basic crochet stitches and techniques all patterns are written in english and in standard us terms **let s be friends ** website http //www denimade com instagram https //www instagram com/deni_made/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/deni_made/boards etsy https //www etsy com/shop/denisharpe facebook https //www facebook com/bydenimade/ comminity https //www facebook com/groups/denimade use #denimade when sharing projects on social media i d love to see your work **mailing list** click here 2 to subscribe to our mailing list and receive notifications on new patterns promos and sales **copyright info** denimade makes every effort to publish patterns as accurately as possible even though this pattern has been tested sometimes small errors do slip by please be assured that if errors are found the pattern will be updated and you will automatically receive an email informing you of the update if purchased through ravelry © 2020 denimade do not sell share or modify this pattern you may sell items that you make with this pattern this pattern as with all denimade/deni sharpe patterns is not to be used for educational purpose without written permission from denimade the pattern and images contained in this file are copyright protected thank you for your understanding and cooperation online users please link to denimade when sharing your creations all rights reserved 1 https //blog clover-usa com/2020/10/09/juniper-wall-hanging/ 2 https //denimade us12 list-manage com/subscribe/post u=c6ac908fe71fd778f13fbdb3e&amp id=cbc691ab86
